metaTitle: VILLAS JUBILAN 2 San Pedro del Pinatar | From €179,900
metaDescription: Discover VILLAS JUBILAN 2 in San Pedro del Pinatar, Murcia. Modern bungalows from €179,900 with 1-3 bedrooms. Delivery 2028. Trusted developer PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE.

content.heroIntro:
Welcome to VILLAS JUBILAN 2, an exclusive new development in Los Antolinos, San Pedro del Pinatar, brought to you by the trusted PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE. These modern bungalows represent the perfect blend of contemporary design, affordability, and coastal living on Spain's Costa Blanca. Starting from just €179,900, VILLAS JUBILAN 2 offers 1 to 3 bedroom bungalows with built sizes ranging from 53 to 96 square meters, ideal for couples, families, and investors seeking excellent value.

Located in a rapidly developing area with strong rental demand and consistent property appreciation, San Pedro del Pinatar has become increasingly popular with international buyers. The region combines the tranquility of small-town living with easy access to world-class amenities, pristine Blue Flag beaches, and championship golf courses. With delivery scheduled for December 1, 2028, these properties represent a smart investment opportunity in one of Spain's most desirable coastal regions.

Whether you're looking for a primary residence, a holiday retreat, or an investment property with strong rental potential, VILLAS JUBILAN 2 delivers exceptional quality and value. PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE has carefully designed each property with modern finishes, efficient layouts, and community amenities including a swimming pool. Discover why hundreds of international buyers are choosing San Pedro del Pinatar for their Spanish property investment.

locationSection.intro: Los Antolinos, San Pedro del Pinatar, is a charming coastal destination in the Murcia region that has emerged as one of Spain's most sought-after property markets. Nestled between the Mar Menor and the Mediterranean, this picturesque area offers a unique lifestyle combining authentic Spanish culture with modern convenience. The region attracts a diverse mix of permanent residents, holiday homeowners, and investors who appreciate its laid-back atmosphere, excellent healthcare facilities, and world-class recreational opportunities. San Pedro del Pinatar benefits from an established international community where English is widely spoken, making integration smooth for foreign buyers. The combination of stunning natural beaches, championship golf courses, and reliable sunshine creates an exceptional living environment. With property values increasing 8% year-on-year and rental yields supporting strong investment returns, Los Antolinos represents outstanding value compared to other European coastal markets.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, English-speaking doctors
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets nearby
Schools: International schools with British curriculum options

propertyFeatures.intro: VILLAS JUBILAN 2 showcases modern construction standards with meticulous attention to detail and premium finishes throughout. Each bungalow is built using quality materials including double-glazed windows with thermal breaks for energy efficiency, ceramic flooring in contemporary designs, and durable internal partitioning. The developer has incorporated practical features for modern living including pre-installation for air conditioning, modern bathroom fixtures, and fully fitted kitchens with branded appliances. Every property benefits from a video entry system for security, private parking spaces, and dedicated storage rooms. The landscaped gardens provide private outdoor space, while select properties feature access to the communal swimming pool—perfect for relaxation and entertaining.

content.investmentSection: VILLAS JUBILAN 2 presents a compelling investment opportunity in a market experiencing robust growth. San Pedro del Pinatar has demonstrated consistent property appreciation with values increasing 8% year-on-year, significantly outpacing inflation. At an average price of €2,200 per square meter, properties here cost approximately 40% less than comparable Spanish island markets, offering exceptional value for money. The rental market is particularly strong, with similar properties commanding €800 per week during peak season, translating to excellent annual yields. The region's growing popularity with international tourists and relocating professionals ensures steady demand for both short-term holiday rentals and long-term residential leases. PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE's reputation and the development's prime location guarantee strong capital appreciation potential. Whether you seek rental income or long-term appreciation, VILLAS JUBILAN 2 offers a secure, profitable investment vehicle with guaranteed delivery by December 2028.

faqs.answer: Properties in VILLAS JUBILAN 2 start from €179,900. The development features bungalows with 1-3 bedrooms and built sizes from 53-96 square meters. faqs.question: When will VILLAS JUBILAN 2 be completed?

Flexible payment plans and installment options are available during the construction phase. Contact our team for specific delivery schedules and payment arrangements.

faqs.question: Is San Pedro del Pinatar a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. San Pedro del Pinatar is an excellent choice for property investment. The area has an established international community where English is commonly spoken, making integration straightforward for foreign buyers. Property values show consistent growth at 8% year-on-year, with strong rental demand supporting investment returns. The location offers multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, championship golf courses nearby, and comprehensive amenities including regional hospitals with English-speaking doctors.

faqs.question: How far is VILLAS JUBILAN 2 from the beach?
faqs.answer: VILLAS JUBILAN 2 is conveniently located within 20 minutes of multiple Blue Flag beaches. This proximity provides easy access to world-class beaches while maintaining a peaceful residential setting away from crowded tourist areas. Perfect for both beach lovers and those seeking a quieter lifestyle.

faqs.question: What amenities are near VILLAS JUBILAN 2?
faqs.answer: VILLAS JUBILAN 2 benefits from excellent nearby amenities including Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets for shopping; a regional hospital within 30 minutes with English-speaking doctors; several championship golf courses within close proximity; and international schools with British curriculum options. Multiple restaurants and a vibrant local community complete the offering.

content.conclusion: VILLAS JUBILAN 2 represents a rare opportunity to acquire modern, quality properties in one of Spain's most desirable coastal locations at outstanding value. Developed by the trusted PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE, these bungalows combine contemporary design, practical features, and prime location to deliver both lifestyle and investment benefits. Whether you're seeking a Mediterranean residence, a holiday home with strong rental income, or a shrewd property investment, VILLAS JUBILAN 2 exceeds expectations. With delivery guaranteed by December 2028, now is the perfect time to secure your property in San Pedro del Pinatar. The combination of 8% annual property appreciation, €800 weekly rental potential, and established international community make this an exceptionally attractive opportunity. Don't miss out on this exclusive development—contact us via WhatsApp today for detailed information, availability, and personalized guidance from our expert team.
